name: Making a platformer platformer
description:
PLEASE READ

In this game you are the creator of a platformer! To make the platformer, you have to play through it, first as an artist, then a programmer, then a playtester. You must get to the flags to get a checkpoint, or beat that level, by jumping from platform to platform and avoiding red spikes!

Once you get to the final flag for the Artist, you will then become the programmer, and then the playtester.
Each level is the same, but with a different challenge for whomever you're playing as!

Artist
You haven't completed the art yet, so all of the platforms are a mere dot! 
Jump to the white dots, and you will reveal the art for that platform!
Once you jump on them, they will be revealed for the rest of the game (unless you don't make the due date!).

Programmer
You haven't fixed all of the bugs, so when the platforms turn bright red you must be careful to avoid them, or they'll shock and kill you!

Playtester
You must complete the game within a time limit to prove you're good enough!

Video! Since it is too difficult, here is a video so everyone can see the whole game!

You must also do all of this within the due date! Your game needs to be released and can't be late!

Controls:

  • Left and Right Arrow keys Or A and D - Left and Right
  • Up Arrow key Or Space - Jump
  • Escape - Quit
  • M - Mute

Sounds from https://www.bfxr.net/ and http://sfbgames.com/chiptone

Music from https://pernyblom.github.io/abundant-music/index.html
